meanings.definition: A person who is an expert in cultivating roses.
meanings.sent1: The rosarians in our town have beautiful gardens filled with roses.
meanings.sent2: I aspire to become a rosarian and grow the most vibrant roses.
meanings.sent3: The rosarians had a friendly competition to see who could grow the tallest rose.
meanings.sent4: Her hands were like those of a rosarian, nurturing each rose with care.
meanings.sent5: The rosarians' knowledge of roses is as deep as the roots of the plants themselves.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals who are dedicated to the cultivation and care of roses.
meanings.sent1: Our local rosarians meet every month to share tips on rose care.
meanings.sent2: The rosarians organized a fundraiser to plant more roses in the community.
meanings.sent3: During the rose festival, the rosarians wore matching hats adorned with rose pins.
meanings.sent4: The unity among the rosarians was like a garden where every rose thrived together.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of the rosarians shines through in the blooming roses all around town.
